comment: I wonder if this was their plan from the beginning. In the alt-right seemed unstoppable. The only thing that could destroy the alt-right was co-option by the GOP establishment, just like they did with the Tea Party. Then all of a sudden you have Ricky Vaughn as a leader of the alt-right, supported by TRS and The Daily Stormer, trying to merge the alt-right into the Republican party as the "hard-edge of the GOP".
